params.allowed: Boolean that sets approval amount, true for type(uint256).max and false for 0.
params.expiry: The timestamp at which the permit is no longer valid.
params.holder: The address of the token owner.
params.nonce: The owner's nonce, increases at each call to permit.
params.r: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the owner along with v and s.
params.s: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the owner along with r and v.
params.spender: The address of the token spender.
params.v: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the owner along with r and s.
